statements: SELECT * FROM luxury_home_transactions
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM luxury_home_transactions WHERE buyer_name = 'Alice'
SELECT seller_name, seller_email FROM luxury_home_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000000
SELECT buyer_name, buyer_email, seller_name, seller_email FROM luxury_home_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT property_id, transaction_amount, buyer_name FROM luxury_home_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM luxury_home_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_name, seller_name FROM luxury_home_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT property_id, buyer_name, seller_name FROM luxury_home_transactions WHERE seller_name LIKE 'John%' AND buyer_email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY buyer_name ASC, seller_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT buyer_name, seller_name FROM luxury_home_transactions WHERE transaction_amount >= 100000 AND buyer_email <> seller_email ORDER BY buyer_name, seller_name
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM luxury_home_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM luxury_homes;
SELECT address, price FROM luxury_homes WHERE bedrooms > 3;
SELECT id, address, price FROM luxury_homes WHERE available = true;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT seller_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY seller_id;
SELECT * FROM luxury_homes WHERE price >= 100000 ORDER BY price DESC, bedrooms ASC;
SELECT id, address, price, available FROM luxury_homes WHERE bedrooms > 4 AND bathrooms > 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT address, bedrooms, bathrooms FROM luxury_homes WHERE available = TRUE AND price < 500000 ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount <= 200000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, property_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 50000 AND amount < 300000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_homes;
SELECT id, address, price FROM luxury_homes WHERE price > 100000;
SELECT id, address, type FROM luxury_homes ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT * FROM buyers WHERE budget < 500000;
SELECT id, name, email FROM buyers WHERE phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM luxury_homes WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT address, price FROM luxury_homes WHERE type = 'Mansion' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT address, size FROM luxury_homes WHERE size >= 5000 AND type = 'Penthouse';
SELECT * FROM buyers WHERE budget >= 500000 ORDER BY name;
SELECT b.name, lh.address, t.amount FROM buyers b JOIN transactions t ON b.id = t.buyer_id JOIN luxury_hjson lh ON t.property_id = lh.id WHERE t.amount >= 500000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_home_sellers;
SELECT seller_name, seller_email FROM luxury_home_sellers;
SELECT home_id, home_address, home_price FROM luxury_homes WHERE home_status = 'For Sale';

SELECT seller_name, buyer_name, transaction_date FROM luxury_home_sellers INNER JOIN transactions ON luxury_home_sellers.seller_id = transactions.seller_id INNER JOIN luxury_home_buyers ON transactions.buyer_id = luxury_home_buyers.buyer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_home_sellers WHERE seller_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT seller_name, seller_phone FROM luxury_home_sellers ORDER BY seller_name DESC;
SELECT buyer_name, buyer_email FROM luxury_home_buyers WHERE buyer_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM luxury_homes WHERE home_price > 100000 ORDER BY home_price ASC, home_address DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, s.seller_name, b.buyer_name FROM transactions t JOIN luxury_home_sellers s ON t.seller_id = s.seller_id JOIN luxury_home_buyers b ON t.buyer_id = b.buyer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 50000;
SELECT * FROM luxury_homes;
SELECT id, address, price FROM luxury_homes WHERE bedrooms >= 3;
SELECT address, price FROM luxury_homes ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_methods;
SELECT * FROM luxury_homes WHERE price >= 100000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT address, price FROM luxury_homes WHERE bedrooms >= 4 AND bathrooms >= 3 ORDER BY price LIMIT 5;

SELECT users.username, luxury_homes.address, transactions.amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id JOIN luxury_homes ON transactions.home_id = luxury_homes.id WHERE transactions.amount > 5000;

SELECT bookings.booking_id, users.username, luxury_homes.address, bookings.check_in_date, bookings.check_out_date FROM bookings JOIN users ON bookings.user_id = users.user_id JOIN luxury_homes ON bookings.home_id = luxury_homes.id ORDER BY bookings.check_in_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount_spent > 10000;
